Class PurchaseCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • paypal.payflow.PurchaseCard

extends java.lang.Object

        Parameters:
        acct - Purchase Card number
        expDate - Card expiry date (format mmyy)
        cardType - Purchase Card type (P - Personal, C - Corprate, B - Business)

      • getCvv2

        public java.lang.String getCvv2()
        Gets the CVV2 value. Card validation code. This is the 3 or 4 digit code present at the back side of the card.
        Returns:
        CVV2 value

      • setTxId

        public void setTxId(java.lang.String txId)
        Sets the Transaction Id (stored credential).

        The transaction Id to reference a stored crendential

        Parameters:
        txId - String *

        Maps to Payflow Parameter : TXID

      • getAcct

        public java.lang.String getAcct()
        gets the Account holders account number.
        Returns:
        String

        Maps to Payflow Parameters as follows: Specific transaction Payflow Parameter Transactions with CreditCard, PurchaseCard, BankAcct payment devices ACCT Transactions with CheckPayment MICR Transactions with SwipeCard SWIPE
